name: None
description: No specific equipment is required for this exercise.

name: Barbell
description: A long metal bar, typically used with weights.

name: Dumbbells
description: Short bars with weights on each end, used individually or in pairs.

name: Bench
description: A flat or inclined surface used for exercises like bench press.

name: Pull-up Bar
description: A horizontal bar used for pull-ups.

name: Weight (optional)
description: Additional weight, such as plates or dumbbells, used to increase the intensity of an exercise.

name: Leg Press Machine
description: A machine that allows you to push weight with your legs.

name: Rowing Machine
description: A machine used to simulate the action of rowing a boat.

name: Parallel Bars
description: Two parallel bars used for dips and other exercises.

name: Kettlebell
description: A cast iron ball with a handle, used for ballistic exercises.

name: Resistance Band
description: An elastic band used for strength training and stretching.

name: Cable Machine
description: A versatile gym machine with adjustable cables and pulleys.

name: Jump Rope
description: A simple piece of equipment for cardiovascular exercise.

name: Yoga Mat
description: A padded mat for floor exercises, yoga, or stretching.

name: Leg Curl Machine
description: A machine used to isolate and strengthen the hamstrings.

name: Leg Extension Machine
description: A machine used to isolate and strengthen the quadriceps.

name: Plyometric Box
description: A sturdy box used for jumping exercises to build explosive power.

name: Medicine Ball
description: A weighted ball used for various exercises, including core and power movements.

name: Stationary Bike
description: A stationary bicycle used for cardiovascular exercise.
